TypeSignature.Value: public class ListCollectionView : System.Windows.Data.CollectionView, System.Collections.IComparer, System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping, System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView, System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem, System.ComponentModel.IItemProperties

summary.span: 表示实现 的集合的集合视图。

span.span: Represents the collection view for collections that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您将绑定到数据收集时，可以进行排序、 筛选器，或对数据进行分组。When you bind to a data collection, you may want to sort, filter, or group the data. 为此，请使用集合视图。To do that, you use collection views. 您可以将作为基于绑定源集合，可用于导航和显示基于排序、 筛选和分组查询的源集合的层，所有而无需操作的基础源集合本身。You can think of a as the layer on top of the binding source collection that allows you to navigate and display the source collection based on sort, filter, and group queries, all without having to manipulate the underlying source collection itself. 如果源集合实现接口，所做的更改引起事件传播到视图。If the source collection implements the interface, the changes raised by the event are propagated to the views. 所有集合都具有默认值。All collections have a default . 实现的所有集合，则对象是默认视图对象。For all collections implementing , the object is the default view object. 是用于实现的集合的集合视图类。The is the collection view class used for collections that implement . 若要获取的默认视图，请使用方法。To get the default view, you use the method. 有关示例，请参阅[如何： 获取数据集合的默认视图](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-get-the-default-view-of-a-data-collection.md)。For an example, see [How to: Get the Default View of a Data Collection](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-get-the-default-view-of-a-data-collection.md). 有关集合视图的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information about collection views, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).

summary.span: 开始添加事务并返回挂起的新项。

span.span: Starts an add transaction and returns the pending new item.
The pending new item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用开始添加事务。Calling starts an add transaction. 应调用或结束添加事务。You should call or to end the add transaction. 始终在集合视图中将出现一个新项。A new item always appears in the collection view. 任何筛选、 排序或分组操作也将应用于视图应用于新项时调用。Any filtering, sorting, or grouping that is applied to the view is applied to the new item when is called.

span.span: if a new item can be added to the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以创建新项的集合，如果没有编辑事务发生，如果集合不是固定的大小，并且如果可以创建正确类型的对象。The can create a new item for the collection if there is no edit transaction occurring, if the collection is not a fixed size, and if the can create an object of the correct type.

span.span: if a specified object can be added to the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`，可以指定要通过调用添加到集合的对象方法。If the property is `true`, you can specify an object to add to the collection by calling the method. 是`false`如果无法将项添加到集合。 is `false` if items cannot be added to the collection.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示集合视图是否可以放弃挂起的更改并还原所编辑对象的原始值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object.

value.span: 如果集合视图可以放弃挂起的更改并还原所编辑对象的原始值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是`true`如果已编辑的项实现接口。 is `true` if the edited item implements the interface. 如果是`false`，调用以使视图若要退出编辑状态，并提供逻辑来还原已编辑的对象上的更改。If is `false`, call to cause the view to exit the edit state and provide logic to revert the changes on the object that was edited.

abstract member CancelEdit : unit -> unit override this.CancelEdit : unit -> unit

summary.span: 结束编辑事务，并还原项的原始值（如有可能）。

span.span: Ends the edit transaction, and if possible, restores the original value to the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置到`null`并导致要退出编辑状态的集合视图。 sets to `null` and causes the collection view to exit the edit state. 如果是`true`，还还原所编辑对象的原始值。If is `true`, also restores the original values of the edited object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: virtual property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取记录的估计数量。

span.span: Gets the estimated number of records.

value.span: 以下项之一：

span.span: One of the following:
Value
Meaning
Could not determine the count of the collection.

description.span: 此值可能由“虚拟化”视图返回，这时视图特意不考虑基础集合中的所有项，因为它尝试提高效率，尽量降低整个集合始终都可用这一要求。

span.span: This might be returned by a "virtualizing" view, where the view deliberately does not account for all items in the underlying collection because the view is trying to increase efficiency and minimize dependence on always having the whole collection available.
any other integer
The count of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意此计数，表示已筛选的计数。Note that this count represents the filtered count.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator

summary.span: 返回可用于枚举视图中的项的对象。

span.span: Returns an object that you can use to enumerate the items in the view.

returns.span: 一个可用于枚举视图中的项的 对象。

span.span: An object that you can use to enumerate the items in the view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举器实例通常用于进行异步检查的内容的集合，或在此情况下，视图的内容。Enumerator instances are typically used for making asynchronous checks of the contents of a collection, or in this case, the contents of the view. 例如，如果您正准备开始`foreach`迭代视图的内容，可能会更好的做法获取异步复制以确保，视图项的长度不会不意外循环期间发生更改。For example, if you are about to start a `foreach` iteration over the contents of the view, it may be better to obtain an asynchronous copy to ensure that the length of the view items does not change unexpectedly midway through the loop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此属性只能通过访问的集合对象并使用它的各种方法，如设置`Add`。This property can only be set by accessing the collection object and using its various methods such as `Add`. 要访问的集合对象本身的属性是只读的;集合本身是可读/写。The property to access the collection object itself is read-only; the collection itself is read/write. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性：The following example shows how to use this property: [!code-csharp[DataBindingLab#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#6)] [!code-vb[DataBindingLab#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/VisualBasic/MainWindow.xaml.vb#6)] 有关完整示例，请参阅[数据绑定演示](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。For the complete example, see [Data Binding Demo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置为`true`会通知视图的项列表已在进行分组的正确顺序，并允许视图以使用更高效的算法来生成组。Setting this property to `true` informs the view that the list of items is already in the correct order for grouping and allows the view to use a more efficient algorithm to build the groups. 数据位于正确的顺序如果：The data is in the correct order if: 1. 属于给定组的所有项会连续，都显示和All items belonging to a given group appear consecutively, and 2. 如果集合为非空中的组之前的任何其他组，以及作为中的相同顺序出现。If the collection is non-empty, the groups in appear before any other groups, and in the same order as in .
